short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalist New Tab replaces the stock new tab page with a beautiful and customizable user interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalist New Tab is a new tab page that replaces the stock new tab page. Minimalist New Tab gives you access to common Google apps, the local weather and installed Chrome apps. You can also choose between random and custom images, and solid color wallpapers!
